thread.title: Watch the Trailer for Sampha’s New Film Process
thread.title_full: Watch the Trailer for Sampha’s New Film Process

author: Noah Yoo
title: Watch the Trailer for Sampha’s New Film Process
text:
Watch the Trailer for Sampha’s New Film Process The companion movie to his new album is out in March Sampha 
Sampha will release his debut studio album Process on February 3 via Young Turks. Now, the singer-songwriter has announced that the album will have an accompanying film, also titled Process , made by Lemonade director Kahlil Joseph. The film is due out in March. Watch a trailer for it below, soundtracked by a snippet of the song “Plastic 100°C” from Process . 
Revisit Sampha’s Rising interview. From Morden, to Freetown, Sierra Leone. Process: A film by Kahlil Joseph, coming March 2017, only on @AppleMusic https://t.co/gJ12nWJyDa pic.twitter.com/G0hvSWVXwV
